thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Cypress Reports Qtrly Loss Per Share $0.10

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cypress Reports Qtrly Loss Per Share $0.10
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Cypress Semiconductor Corp:
* CYPRESS REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR END 2017 RESULTS * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 12.7 PERCENT TO $597.5 MILLION * QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $0.10 * QTRLY ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.28 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.25, REVENUE VIEW $593.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* CYPRESS SEMICONDUCTOR - SEES Q1 2018 GAAP REVENUE FROM $565 MILLION TO $595 MILLION
* SEES Q1 OF 2018 NON-GAAP DILUTED EPS $0.22 TO $0.26 * SEES Q1 2018 DILUTED GAAP EPS FROM A LOSS OF $0.03 TO A PROFIT OF $0.01 PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
